oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Meharry Medical College, Harold D. West Basic Science Center, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1976
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eleven construction site photographs of the Harold D. West Basic Science Center building, Meharry Medical College, circa 1976. The architects were McKissack & McKissack, with the building construction by the Hardaway Construction Company. The Design Consultants were Curtis & Davis; and Mechanical and Electrical Engineers: L.C. Thomasson & Associates. This campus building, located at 1023 21st Ave. N, opened in December 1976 and is named in honor of Meharry’s first African-American president, Harold Dadford West, Ph.D. Forms part of the Metro Archives Photographs - Buildings Collection. 11 b & w photographs.
